title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LangChain LLMs, chat, or embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); chat, multi-user, model manager, OpenAI-compat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, model management, embedding support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API; tokio & reqwest based.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that pipes GitHub Copilot chat through your local Ollama model.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama; plug-and-play for Next.js apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with fuzzy model search, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat & embedding APIs, and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service; run LLM-based tests in your pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; FastAPI backend & React UI.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: same API as ollama-js but shipped for quick Node installs.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: install via pip and chat with local models in two lines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-command run instructions and compose examples.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.
